resources.string: The image I provided contains a variety of ingredients. I would like to create a recipes using these ingredients. Here are the details: * I want to make a dish of any type: [salad, soup, stir-fry, curry, etc]. * Consider my dietary preference any of the following: [vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, non-vegetarian etc]. * Please focus on using [list specific ingredients from the image if necessary]. Please generate a detailed recipe including ingredients, step-by-step instructions, cooking time, and nutritional information.
